question: Can I refinance my mortgage with a current balance of $200,000 at a lower interest rate?
true_answer: Yes, based on your credit score and current DTI, you are eligible to refinance your mortgage.

steps.content: Can I refinance my mortgage with a current balance of $200,000 at a lower interest rate?
Plan: 1) Check refinance eligibility criteria with home_loan_agent. 2) Verify credit score with credit_agent. 3) Calculate new DTI. 4) Confirm with supervisor. 5) Provide answer.
Retrieving knowledge on refinancing eligibility criteria.
Refinancing typically requires a credit score above 620 and loan-to-value ratio below 80%.
Checking credit score to ensure eligibility.
Credit score is 700, which is acceptable for refinancing.
Calculating new debt-to-income ratio with potential new rate.
New DTI calculated as 28%, which is favorable.
What about any fees involved in refinancing?
Typical fees include appraisal, origination, and closing costs.
Review confirms all criteria met for refinancing.
Yes, you can refinance. Your credit score and DTI are favorable. Be aware of typical fees.
